Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.filters

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.filters 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.filters
    Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.
    com.joliciel.talismane.output
    Classes and templates for producing Talismane's output in CoNLL-X and related formats.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.filters used by com.joliciel.talismane 
    Class and Description
    TextMarkerFilter
    A filter applied to a block of raw text and producing a list of text markers.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.filters used by com.joliciel.talismane.filters 
    Class and Description
    MarkerFilterType
    An action to take by a particular TextMarkerFilter.
    These actions are either stack based or unary.
    Stack-based markers can be nested.
    If unary markers (e.g.
    RegexMarkerFilter
    For a given regex, finds any matches within the text, and adds the appropriate marker to these matches.
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
    SentenceHolder 
    SentenceTag
    A sentence tag which is used to add arbitrary attributes to tokens found in this sentence.
    TextMarker
    A text marker, indicating a position within a block of text and the action to take.
    TextMarkerFilter
    A filter applied to a block of raw text and producing a list of text markers.
    TextMarkerType
    A marker that can be applied at a certain character position in the text, indicating whether processing should stop or start again, and whether a hard sentence break should be applied.
    Note that declaration order is important, since SENTENCE_BREAK needs to be processed prior to the others.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.filters used by com.joliciel.talismane.output 
    Class and Description
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.filters used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser 
    Class and Description
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.filters used by com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector 
    Class and Description
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.filters used by com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser 
    Class and Description
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
